Class ExplorationDAO

public class ExplorationDAO extends Object
Class for Exploration Data Access Object for SQLite queries

    • getAllbyUser

      public List<Exploration> getAllbyUser(int user_ID)
      Method that gets specific country exploration data

    • getByUserIdCountryId

      public Exploration getByUserIdCountryId(int userID, int countryID)
      Retrieves the exploration data for a specific user and country. This method executes a SQL query to fetch the exploration details for the given user ID and country ID. If a matching record is found, it is mapped to an Exploration object and returned.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user for whom the exploration data is being retrieved
      countryID - the ID of the country for which the exploration data is being retrieved
      Returns:
      an Exploration object containing the exploration data for the specified user and country, or null if no matching record is found or an SQL exception occurs

    • getCurrentExploring

      public String getCurrentExploring(int id)
      Method that gets the country the user is currently exploring
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user whose current exploring country is being retrieved
      Returns:
      the name of the country the user is currently exploring, or an empty string if no such country is found or an exception occurs

    • getFirstLockedCountry

      public int getFirstLockedCountry(int id)
      Retrieves the first locked country ID for a specific user from the database. This method executes a SQL query to fetch the ID of the first country that is marked as locked for the specified user. If a matching record is found, the country ID is returned.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user whose locked country is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the country ID of the first locked country for the specified user, or -1 if no locked country is found or an error occurs

    • unlockCountry

      public void unlockCountry(int userID, int countryID)
      Unlocks a country for a specific user by updating the locked status in the database.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user who is unlocking the country
      countryID - the ID of the country to be unlocked

    • getCountryCurrent

      public Country getCountryCurrent(int userID)
      Retrieves the current country that the specified user is exploring. This method executes a SQL query to fetch the details of the country that the specified user is currently marked as exploring. If a matching record is found, it is mapped to a Country object and returned.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user whose current exploring country is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a Country object containing the details of the country the user is currently exploring, or null if no such country is found or an error occurs

    • countLocked

      public int countLocked(int userID)
      Method that counts the number of unexplored countries.
      Parameters:
      userID - the userID
      Returns:
      the count of unexplored countries

    • countUnlocked

      public int countUnlocked(int userID)
      Method that counts the number of unlocked countries.
      Parameters:
      userID - the userID
      Returns:
      the count of unlocked countries

    • getNextDestination

      public List<String> getNextDestination(int id)
      Method that gets the first locked destination with the lowest exp
      Parameters:
      id - the userID
      Returns:
      Returns a list of the country name and the required exp

    • close

      public void close()
      Method that closes the database connection
